pages.text: Supplementaries is a mod for decorating and utilities, it adds a lot beautiful and useful things.$(br)    Enter "@supplementaries" in JEI searching box to see all items in this mod.
Any wood can be used to craft this, R-click with any item to set the icon, R-click with empty hands to enter texts.
Any wood can be used to craft this, can be put on the sides of fences. Use a lodestone compass to set its deriction.
Lanterns can be placed on sides of blocks and fences, lanterns in Skinned Lanterns are supported.
You can put books, maps and banner patterns in it.
Should be used with keys, binded safes need keys with the same name.
Output exact redstone signals. SHIFT+R-click to reverse the rotation.
When powered, rotate the facing block/entity. Stronger signal, faster speed.
Can be filled with any sand/dust. Different dusts have different duration, can be reversed by Turn Table.
When hit a block's bottom, it will release a rope.
Put in ropes or chains, control the rotation with crank, when the end of ropes/chains hit the bottom, reverse the rotation to drag the block up.
Output the fluids in the jar/cauldron.
